roles.title: Co-Founder & Lead Engineer
roles.description:
- Co-founded an AI automation company, building intelligent systems to solve real-world business problems.
- Architected and developed SPARC, a proprietary AI-assisted development framework that enables the delivery of high-quality, fully documented websites in as little as three days.
- Built and deployed a suite of custom AI agents to automate entire business workflows, from lead intake to social media content creation.

roles.title: On-site Technical Owner
roles.description:
- Acted as the primary on-site technical owner for a multi-million dollar business, responsible for maintaining critical technology infrastructure.
- Conducted regular tech audits and preventative maintenance, achieving over 99% uptime for POS and network systems.
- Provided rapid-response troubleshooting for technical failures, minimizing downtime and protecting revenue.

roles.title: Operational Management
roles.description: Gained front-lines experience with real-world inefficiency, technical failures, and urgent customer needs, informing a pragmatic approach to software development and problem-solving.

roles.title: Team & Systems Leadership
roles.description: Led teams and managed systems in high-pressure, customer-facing environments. This experience provided a deep understanding of operational efficiency, user experience, and the direct business impact of technology.
